title: FPS DROP & all help apriciated!
body:
Hi!

So in the past few days i have been experiencing a lot of fps drops. So basically i ran a stable 230-250 fps with 40-45 ping and now i the game is acting crazy! My fps is 40-50 and sometimes jumps to 80 and back to 40-50, but ping is always the same. And even the lag in teamfights is happening.

My  computer is a new Toshiba laptop just bought 3 months ago and here are the specs:

i7 processor 3.50Ghz
Amd Radeon 2 Gb graphics
8 Gb Ram

Im running the game at highest settings without vsync.

I really don't know what happened i didnt change anything on my laptop or downloaded i was just playing lol a hell lot (like 5 hours a day) and overheating also wasn't the problem because Speccy (program) didnt detect any problems.

All the help and response is apriciated!

replies.body:
40 FPS is still very playable, though. Maybe it might be worth just leaving it as it is (don't fix it if it isn't broken), instead of risking it catastrophically dropping because of something you tried.

Nevertheless if you've determined that the game does run better than it is currently it would be worth investigating. What OS are you running on that laptop, and who's your ISP?

Well i got used to play on that smooth fps but now the feeling isnt the same and even a litlle lag is seen...
I run Windows 8.1 and my ISP is Austrian A1.
All the help and feedback is apriciated!

Check out [this page](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-troubleshooting). Mainly, check for heat and that everything is updated. Even if a program tells you everything is fine, it could be that the thermostat is wrong.

I would also suggest uninstalling programs such as "Speccy", because they may be hampering the function of your computer. If you've installed anything else that monitors or claims to "enhance" your computer, try playing League with those uninstalled.
